west_2_east_2015.name: West to east road trip (Sep 2015)
west_2_east_2015.info: Our road trip starting from Seattle, WA and heading to our home in Notre Dame, IN. This is the second stage of our road trip during my internship at Microsoft Research.

slides.title: Let's the adventure begin!
slides.content: God created Raki and Fish! We started our journey after tasting delicious fish while enjoying wonderful Turkish drink Raki.

east_2_west_2015.name: East to west road trip (Jun 2015)
east_2_west_2015.info:
Our road trip starting from Southbend IN and heading to Seattle WA. We are driving almost 2500 miles across continent, while visiting 9 different states and several cities on our path

Here is a blog posts from Nur
1 2 3 4 5 6 7

slides.title: Starting point: home
slides.content: We are starting our journey from Notre Dame. We prepared our stuff, cleared memory cards and charged batteries. Treats and drinks are also ready for our first long distance road trip.

slides.title: First stop: St. Louis
slides.content: Our first stop was St. Louis. We arrived there around noon and start wondering around town. It was a rainy day that's why we try to find old court house quickly and got our tickets for Gateways arch. It was a claustrophobic experience while reaching to the top of arch. They have a small capsules that can hardly accommodate 5 people. Nevertheless scenery was beautiful on the top of this 630-foot giant metal structure. We can easily see all downtown and Eads bridge that connects US rail system for the first time by passing Mississippi river. We later went to Butterfly house that I reccommend everyone to visit. It is a wonderful greenhouse that housing more than 20 species of beautiful creatures.

slides.title: Second stop: Kansas City
slides.content: We were exhausted when we arrived Kansas City. After a long drive from Notre Dame, we enjoyed our dinner. As recommended to us, we tasted delicious briskets and ribs yummy :)

slides.title: Third stop: Colorado Springs
slides.content: After a long drive from Kansas City, we arrived Manitou springs for our hotel very late. We started our third day very early to visit and headed to the Gardens of the Gods. After enjoying beautiful view we drove to the top of Pikes peak. All of those places are breath-taking and I recommend you to visit :)

slides.title: Fourth stop: Salt Lake City
slides.content: Salt Lake is a beautiful city and we enjoyed both city center and parks around it.

slides.title: Fifth stop: Twin Falls
slides.content: So much beauty in a very small radius of area.

california_2013.name: California (Dec 2013)
california_2013.info: We wanted to spend our Christmas holiday in warmer places :)

slides.title: First stop: Los Angeles :)
slides.content: We spent our first couple of days exploring Los Angeles. We visited wax museum, hollywood and farmers market. In our last day in Los Angeles, we enjoyed beach for couple of hours. We choose bus as a way to commute between Los Angeles and San Francisco. We visited Chinatown and took our bus from main train station.

slides.title: San Francisco
slides.content: It is a lovely city that we enjoyed a lot. We booked a hotel in Chinatown, which has very nice neighborhood. We visited golden gate bridge, Fisherman Wharf, Lombard Street and piers along the seaside.
